title: Regedor Filho (O)
body: (O) A biweekly newspaper, which had 24 issues, the first on February 14, 1828, and the last on May 24 of the same year. It was the continuation of Regedor, which was published in 1823.

1828: Publication of the newspaper 'O Regedor Filho', a continuation of 'O Regedor'
